member.name: T:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient
member.summary: Class for connecting, sending, and recieving with a JacoChat Server.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects to the server on ip and port.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.SendRaw(System.String)
member.summary: Directly writes the message to the output stream.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.SendPrivmsg(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Sends a privmsg to a channel with a format specifier.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.SendPrivmsg(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a privmsg to a channel.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.PartChannel(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parts from the channel with an option reason.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.GetTopic(System.String)
member.summary: Requests the server to send the topic for the channel.
member.param: The channel to get the topic for.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.SetTopic(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the topic of a channel (must have ChanOp privileges).

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.Whois(System.String)
member.summary: Requests the server to send back WHOIS data on a user.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.GetNames(System.String)
member.summary: Requests the server to send a names list for a channel.
member.param: The channel to get names for.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.KickUser(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Kicks a user from a channel (must have ChanOp privileges).
member.param: The channel to kick the user from.
The reason the user is being kicked.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.BanUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Bans a user from the channel.
member.param: The channel to ban the user from.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.ChangeChanOp(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Changes the channel op privileges of a user in a channel (must have ChanOp privileges).
member.param: The channel the user is in.

member.name: M:JacoChatClient.JacoChatClient.GetList
member.summary: Requests the server to send a list of channels and information.
